sentences.en: Although she was wealthy, she lived in an unpretentious house.
sentences.cn: 她虽然富有, 住的却是朴素的房子.

sentences.en: And as far as they are unpretentious in food you can find them absolutely everywhere.
sentences.cn: 只要有食物,你就可以发现他们的影踪.

sentences.en: He is a very famous singer but he is completely unpretentious.
sentences.cn: 他是位很有名的歌唱家，但他非常谦逊。

sentences.en: Ideally, my partner would be intelligent, feminine, attractive, kind, considerate and unpretentious.
sentences.cn: 我理想的伴侣应该是聪慧, 娇柔, 迷人, 友善, 体贴,而且谦逊的.

sentences.en: It's unpretentious and following it will lead you to your most authentic joy and happiness.
sentences.cn: 它是不矫揉造作的,跟随它可以指引你找到自己最真的欢乐和幸福.

sentences.en: Like Ms Trott , Vox is unpretentious and accessible.
sentences.cn: 跟她一样,Vox朴实无华,简单易懂.

sentences.en: Midwesterners are straightforward and unpretentious, with a reputation as resolute individualists who can be somewhat hardheaded.
sentences.cn: 中西部的人直截了当而不矫饰, 他们一向被认为是坚决的个人主义者,但可能有点固执.

sentences.en: She managed to impart great elegance to the unpretentious dress she was wearing.
sentences.cn: 她使自己朴素的衣着看起来也十分优雅。

sentences.en: She was caustically brilliant, yet totally loyal, unpretentious, human and tolerant.
sentences.cn: 她这个人才气逼人，可是绝对忠诚可靠，而且毫不做作，有人情味和宽容心。

sentences.en: That's the sort of painting I like: simple, suggestive and unpretentious.
sentences.cn: 我就是喜欢这种画; 朴素, 发人深思,而且毫无矫揉造作之感.

sentences.en: The Tides Inn is both comfortable and unpretentious.
sentences.cn: 泰得斯小酒店舒适而又简洁。

sentences.en: This is the real man, XieQiFangGang and unpretentious, while others need help and to bear.
sentences.cn: 这才是真正的男儿, 血气方刚而又朴实无华, 当他人需要帮助时又有所担当.

words.tran_cn: 谦逊的；含蓄的；不炫耀的；不铺张的

trans.tran_cn: 不炫耀的，不矫饰的，谦逊的，朴实无华的，不铺张的
trans.tran_en: not trying to seem better, more important etc than you really are – use this to show approval
